script.dialog: Have you come here to give me your heart?
No. I actually need my heart right now, but |wave|I've come here to share my love with you!
I'm feeling a little cold.    |L|Is it getting colder?    |L|You want a hug to warm up?
Ah yes, the one who tries to love me.|L||!|You've come back once again.
I see your heart is glowing more brightly than ever before.|L||!|That will not matter.
Why do you resist?|L||!|I know you are in pain.
I'm actually feeling extraordinarily okay right now!
Look at your wings.|L||!|You cannot fly.|L||!|You must feel worthless.
Simply give me your heart, and the loneliness will end.
All the other monsters seem to prefer love over whatever they were feeling before.|L||!|Maybe we can try that first?
Zaraden girl,   I am incapable of love.
|shake|I am nothing!|L||!|I feel    nothing!|L||!|I AM THE VOID!
